about_the_game:
Galatico is an exhilarating first-person boomer shooter set in the far future. The powerful mega-corporation, Galatico, controls the universe’s premier mode of transportation: portals. In this adrenaline-pumping shooter, you will battle your way through relentless Guards, advanced Sentries, formidable Generals, and fearsome Hunters to dismantle the corporation’s iron grip and restore freedom.

Key Features:

  • Intense Combat: Engage in fast-paced, high-octane battles.

  • Varied Enemies: Confront a diverse array of foes, each with unique abilities and tactics.

  • Strategic Gameplay: Utilise portals to outmanoeuvre opponents and gain the upper hand.

  • Skill-Based Action: Master your skills to survive in boomer shooter-inspired levels.

Inspirations: Drawn from legendary titles like Doom, Dusk, Zortch, Ultrakill, Half-Life, and many other iconic first-person shooters.

Prepare for an epic journey filled with action, strategy, and heart-pounding excitement as you fight to bring down Galatico!

content_descriptors.notes: Galatico contains some acts of violence that some players may find inappropriate. The main gameplay involves violence with weapons.

Galatico is an exhilarating first-person boomer shooter set in the far future. The powerful mega-corporation, Galatico, controls the universe’s premier mode of transportation: portals. In this adrenaline-pumping shooter, you will battle your way through relentless Guards, advanced Sentries, formidable Generals, and fearsome Hunters to dismantle the corporation’s iron grip and restore freedom.

  • Strategic Gameplay: Utilise portals to outmanoeuvre opponents and gain the upper hand.

Inspirations: Drawn from legendary titles like Doom, Dusk, Zortch, Ultrakill, Half-Life, and many other iconic first-person shooters.

name: Galatico Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 Or Later
  • Processor: 2.4GHZ Dual Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800GT Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHZ Quad Core Processor Or Higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 460 Or Equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64-bit Recommended

short_description: Fight your way through the mega-corporation Galatico, the gatekeepers of the universe’s most powerful transportation devices. Destroy their infrastructure and blast your way to the top in this boomer shooter inspired FPS.
